description:
./run_tests.sh currently asks sudo passwd for installing python-m2crypto in Ubuntu Oneiric.

Since it is installed with sudo, the venv cannot find the package.

Check if python-m2crypto is installed before installing venv and soft link M2Crypto to venv lib.
title: Check M2Crypto before making venv in Oneiric

comments.content:
